Initializer# init(truncating:)

iOS 26.0+iPadOS 26.0+Mac Catalyst 26.0+macOS 26.0+tvOS 26.0+visionOS 26.0+watchOS 26.0+

```
init(truncating transform: ProjectiveTransform3DFloat)
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/spatial/affinetransform3dfloat/init(truncating:)-1jfno#parameters)

`transform`The source transform.

## [Return Value](/documentation/spatial/affinetransform3dfloat/init(truncating:)-1jfno#return-value)

A new affine transform structure.

## [Discussion](/documentation/spatial/affinetransform3dfloat/init(truncating:)-1jfno#discussion)

Returns a new affine transform structure from the first three rows of the specified projective transform.

Note

This function is similar to @p SPAffineTransform3DFloatMakeWithProjective, but it ignores the last row of the matrix.
